description.zh-cn: 位于非洲南端的共和国，是非洲经济规模最大、最发达的国家之一。拥有三个首都：行政首都比勒陀利亚、立法首都开普敦、司法首都布隆方丹。
description.en: A republic located at the southern tip of Africa, one of the largest and most developed economies on the continent. It has three capitals: Pretoria (administrative), Cape Town (legislative), and Bloemfontein (judicial).

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，现任南非总统。
description.en: South African politician, current President of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，现任南非副总统。
description.en: South African politician, current Deputy President of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，现任全国省务会主席。
description.en: South African politician, current Chairperson of the National Council of Provinces.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，现任国民议会议长。
description.en: South African politician, current Speaker of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 南非法律界人士，现任首席大法官。
description.en: South African jurist, current Chief Justice.

description.zh-cn: 南非议会的上议院。
description.en: The upper house of the Parliament of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非议会的下议院。
description.en: The lower house of the Parliament of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非最高宪法法院。
description.en: The supreme constitutional court of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非共和国的前身，为大英帝国的自治领。
description.en: The predecessor to the Republic of South Africa, a dominion of the British Empire.

nodes.id: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国

zh-cn: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国
en: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland

description.zh-cn: 1801年至1922年的英国国号，在此期间殖民南非。
description.en: The formal name of the United Kingdom from 1801 to 1922, during which it colonized South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 英国国会通过的一项法案，旨在成立南非联邦。
description.en: An Act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom which created the Union of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 1948年至1990年代初在南非实行的一套种族隔离制度。
description.en: A system of institutionalised racial segregation that existed in South Africa from 1948 until the early 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 从1948年到1994年统治南非的政党，是种族隔离制度的主要推行者。
description.en: The governing party of South Africa from 1948 to 1994, and the primary implementer of the apartheid system.

description.zh-cn: 此次选举导致国民党上台执政，并开始推行种族隔离制度。
description.en: This election brought the National Party to power and marked the beginning of the implementation of apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，国民党领导人，在总理任内开始推行种族隔离政策。
description.en: South African politician and leader of the National Party, who as Prime Minister began implementing apartheid policies.

description.zh-cn: 一项旨在向南非政府施压，以结束种族隔离制度的国际运动。
description.en: An international movement aimed at pressuring the South African government to end apartheid.

nodes.id: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

zh-cn: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，南非种族隔离时期最后一位国家总统，在其任内废除了种族隔离制度。
description.en: South African politician who served as the last State President of apartheid-era South Africa and oversaw the end of apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 南非的主要政党之一，自1994年以来一直是执政党。
description.en: A major political party in South Africa, and the governing party since 1994.

description.zh-cn: 南非反种族隔离革命家、政治领袖，曾任南非总统。
description.en: South African anti-apartheid revolutionary and political leader who served as President of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 南非历史上首次不分种族的民主选举，标志着种族隔离制度的结束。
description.en: The first non-racial democratic election in South Africa's history, marking the end of apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 17世纪在南非建立首个欧洲殖民地的荷兰特许公司。
description.en: The Dutch chartered company that established the first European colony in South Africa in the 17th century.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰东印度公司在好望角建立的殖民地。
description.en: A colony of the Dutch East India Company established at the Cape of Good Hope.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰殖民地官员，在好望角建立了欧洲人在南非的首个定居点。
description.en: A Dutch colonial administrator who established the first European settlement in South Africa at the Cape of Good Hope.

description.zh-cn: 英国在非洲南部的殖民地，后成为南非联邦的一部分。
description.en: A British colony in Southern Africa which later became part of the Union of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪初期，布尔人（阿非利卡人）离开开普殖民地向内陆迁移的运动，并建立了几个独立的布尔共和国。
description.en: An eastward migration of Dutch-speaking settlers (Boers/Afrikaners) who travelled by wagon from the Cape Colony into the interior of modern South Africa from 1836 onwards, seeking to live beyond the Cape's British colonial administration.

description.zh-cn: 由布尔人建立的独立共和国，后在第二次布尔战争后被英国吞并。
description.en: An independent republic established by the Boers, later annexed by the British after the Second Boer War.

description.zh-cn: 由布尔人建立的独立共和国，后在第二次布尔战争后被英国吞并。
description.en: An independent republic established by the Boers, later annexed by the British after the Second Boer War.

description.zh-cn: 大英帝国与两个独立的布尔共和国之间的战争，最终导致英国吞并这两个共和国。
description.en: A war fought between the British Empire and two independent Boer republics, which resulted in the British annexation of the republics.

description.zh-cn: 南非圣公会大主教和社会权利活动家，因反对种族隔离而闻名。
description.en: South African Anglican cleric and social rights activist, known for his opposition to apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 一个用于描述后种族隔离时期南非的术语，象征其多文化多样性与团结。
description.en: A term used to describe post-apartheid South Africa, symbolizing its multicultural diversity and unity.

description.zh-cn: 南非政治人物，曾于2009年至2018年担任南非总统。
description.en: South African politician who served as the President of South Africa from 2009 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 在雅各布·祖玛辞职后接任南非总统。
description.en: Succeeded Jacob Zuma as President of South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 《1909年南非法案》的通过促成了南非联邦的成立。
description.en: The passage of the South Africa Act 1909 led to the creation of the Union of South Africa.

relationships.target: 大不列颠及爱尔兰联合王国

description.zh-cn: 南非联邦成立时是大英帝国的自治领，直到1931年《威斯敏斯特法令》通过后获得完全主权。
description.en: The Union of South Africa was established as a dominion of the British Empire until gaining full sovereignty with the Statute of Westminster in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 国民党在1948年大选中获胜，开始上台执政。
description.en: The National Party won the 1948 general election and came to power.

description.zh-cn: 国民党上台后，开始建立并推行一套系统的种族隔离制度。
description.en: After coming to power, the National Party began to establish and implement a systematic policy of apartheid.

description.zh-cn: 丹尼尔·马兰领导的国民党政府开始制定并实施严格的种族隔离政策。
description.en: The National Party government, led by Daniel Malan, began to formulate and implement strict apartheid policies.

description.zh-cn: 国际社会的撤资运动和经济制裁是导致种族隔离制度结束的重要因素之一。
description.en: The international disinvestment movement and economic sanctions were significant factors leading to the end of apartheid.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 德克勒克政府采取措施废除种族隔离立法，结束了种族隔离制度。
description.en: The de Klerk government took steps to repeal apartheid legislation, bringing an end to the system.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 德克勒克政府于1990年宣布解除对非洲人国民大会等反种族隔离组织的禁令。
description.en: In 1990, the de Klerk government announced the unbanning of the African National Congress and other anti-apartheid organizations.

relationships.source: 弗雷德里克·威廉·德克勒克

description.zh-cn: 与纳尔逊·曼德拉就政策及政府的过渡进行了双边讨论。
description.en: Held bilateral discussions with Nelson Mandela regarding policy and the transition of government.

description.zh-cn: 在首次不分种族的选举中，非洲人国民大会以压倒性多数获胜，成为执政党。
description.en: In the first non-racial election, the African National Congress won by a landslide, becoming the governing party.

description.zh-cn: 最初构思了“彩虹之国”这一名称来形容后种族隔离时期的南非。
description.en: Originally conceived the term 'Rainbow Nation' to describe post-apartheid South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 推广了“彩虹之国”这一名称，以象征南非的文化多样性与和平共处。
description.en: Promoted the term 'Rainbow Nation' to symbolize South Africa's cultural diversity and peaceful coexistence.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰东印度公司于1652年建立了荷属好望角殖民地。
description.en: The Dutch East India Company founded the Dutch Cape Colony in 1652.

description.zh-cn: 代表荷兰东印度公司在好望角登陆，并建立了一个补给中途站，成为欧洲人在南非的首个定居点。
description.en: Landed at the Cape of Good Hope on behalf of the Dutch East India Company and established a supply station, which became the first European settlement in South Africa.

description.zh-cn: 第二次布尔战争以英国胜利告终，德兰士瓦共和国被英国吞并。
description.en: The Second Boer War ended in a British victory, leading to the annexation of the South African Republic.

description.zh-cn: 第二次布尔战争以英国胜利告终，奥兰治自由邦被英国吞并。
description.en: The Second Boer War ended in a British victory, leading to the annexation of the Orange Free State.

description.zh-cn: 南非于1998年1月1日与中华民国断绝外交关系。
description.en: South Africa severed diplomatic relations with the Republic of China on January 1, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 南非于1998年1月1日与中华人民共和国建立外交关系。
description.en: South Africa established diplomatic relations with the People's Republic of China on January 1, 1998.

description.zh-cn: 由于执政党非国大未能获得多数席位，2024年大选后组成了民族团结政府。
description.en: Following the 2024 election where the ruling ANC failed to secure a majority, a government of national unity was formed.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要政党之一，与民主联盟等党派共同组建民族团结政府。
description.en: As one of the main parties, formed a government of national unity with the Democratic Alliance and other parties.

description.zh-cn: 作为主要反对党，与非洲人国民大会等党派共同组建民族团结政府。
description.en: As the main opposition party, formed a government of national unity with the African National Congress and other parties.

description.zh-cn: 加入了由非洲人国民大会和民主联盟领导的民族团结政府。
description.en: Joined the government of national unity led by the ANC and the DA.

description.zh-cn: 加入了由非洲人国民大会和民主联盟领导的民族团结政府。
description.en: Joined the government of national unity led by the ANC and the DA.
